text.0: indra and agni i invoke fain are we for their song of praise.
text.2: praise ye o men and glorify indraagni in the holy rites.
text.3: sing praise to them in sacred songs.
text.4: indra and agni we invite the somadrinkers for the fame.
text.6: strong gods we bid them come to this libation that stands ready here.
text.7: indra and agni come to us.
text.8: indra and agni mighty lords of our assembly crush the fiends.
text.10: watch ye through this your truthfulness there in the place of spacious view.
text.11: indra and agni send us bliss.
